definition: having a softening or soothing effect especially to the skin, toiletry consisting of any of various substances in the form of a thick liquid that have a soothing and moisturizing effect when applied to the skin
details:
adjective
- having a softening or soothing effect especially to the skin
= synonyms: demulcent
noun
- toiletry consisting of any of various substances in the form of a thick liquid that have a soothing and moisturizing effect when applied to the skin
= synonyms: cream, ointment
